name: Car Loan Game
description:
DESCRIPTION

People like nice cars. Including you, so you bought one.

The only problem is you're now in massive debt.

Drive on the wrong side of the road and collect money that people just keep dropping out their cars or something.  Swerve between vehicles and don't crash to keep your loan as low as possible so you can pay it off.

This game was made for Juice Jam II.

CONTROLS

  • Spacebar to start/continue/honk
  • Arrow keys or WS to move up/down
